article_text: Once the hippest spot in Miami, Coconut Grove faded as South Beach and Brickell rose. Now the Grove is poised for rejuvenation as a new generation of Groveites and some city initiatives seek to restore its identity as a lush Bohemian enclave with few equals.

article_metadata.title: The resurgence of Coconut Grove | Miami Herald
article_metadata.keywords: coco walk, mayfair, south florida, miami, grand avenue, chart house, scotty's landing, grove bay, glass house, fuddruckers, peacock plaza, engle, preservation, gibson plaza, coconut grove playhouse, waterfront

article_summary:
Once the hippest spot in Miami, Coconut Grove faded as South Beach and Brickell rose.
Now the Grove is poised for rejuvenation as a new generation of Groveites and some city initiatives seek to restore its identity as a lush Bohemian enclave with few equals.
